name: Ligis
description:
This is my 7DRL 2017 entry.

You have decided to leave the world behind and enter a tower, a tower that is known to be of a dark lord who will test you in following 'the right path'.

For you to discover the path, you could find the scroll that will reveal the path, or make a lucky guess. There will be pawns of the owner of the tower who will hinder you. You are nothing but a regular man with bare hands. However, these do not stop you.
